generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, with bicycles parked along them and curbs separating them from the road.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring windows, storefronts, and architectural details.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the sidewalk and street, providing shade and greenery.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast or hazy.
- person: A person can be seen standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, including a red car and a white car.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Left Turn" sign on the right and a triangular warning sign on the right.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible at an intersection in the distance on the right side of the street.
- bicycle: Multiple bicycles are parked along the right sidewalk, secured to racks.
